column5: Hi, This is a clean, quiet, comfortable room, You'll enjoy your stay here!  There is a light on the ceiling with the ceiling fan, and a lamp next to the bed. You'll find my home quiet and comfortable. I have a maltipoo who is getting older and may have an accident once in a while - but not in your room - it's rare. She is super sweet, rarely barks and loves people.
column8: Calm, quiet, single-person room in Round Rock!
